Text: Hi, has anyone found a key/serial yet? Without one this pretty useless :-(

This one worked for me:
1TMYT-T0L2X-J24FU-4MDZK

You might also try one of these (they were a set of 4):
M15YR-429DA-YAH6F-4WRX7
N1HPX-6U248-D206Y-4Y8Z6
YHE88-5KCDW-C84DF-4YDQ6

hi, I'm quite new to Linux.... so could someone tell me how to install this type of file??!!
I tried several way but...........:)

Open a terminal...
tar -xvzf filename.tar.gz
cd vmware-distrib
then as "root"
./vmware-install.pl
or if you dont have root, like ubuntu
sudo ./vmware-install.pl
Holy Crap seeder!  Fast as hell :D

thanks @ph0eniGZ
and @Da__Fox @Kzin for coming back to the comments to support other people. that s great. big smile!

@techmester,  you also have option thru Synaptic package manager in Ubuntu. It's in third party repos for Canonical. (system>admin>software sources) then search for VMware server in Synaptic
 hope it helps someone :)
Thanks ph0neiGZ for the upload and thanks kzin for the help! ;)
